name: Skyline_Furniture_Inset_Nail_Button_Headboard_in_Micro-Suede_White
reviews: The headboard itself was a nice color white with silver nailheads. The pieces supplied to attach the headboard to a bedframe did not work well. It was fortunate that the headboard arrived undamaged because the packaging was horrible. The box was opened when I received it and there was nothing protecting the headboard except thin plastic.

This headboard arrived packaged well, with all parts included. Easy installation. The white microfiber fabric is beautiful in my light grey room and the nail heads are perfectly placed. Very happy customer!

We bought this headboard because the curves matched the pattern in our bedroom wallpaper and we have an all white bedroom. The fabric feels soft and the frame feels secure. It really pulled our whole room together. We were pleased with the quality and the time it took to receive this item (about 4 weeks).

Just what we were looking for. Beautiful suede-like covering. I didn't notice how long it would take to ship this "overstocked item." I discovered that this item is made to order; it actually took about six weeks! The box came terribly damaged, but the headboard fortunately was not affected. Love my purchase!
description:
Boost the visual appeal of your bedroom with this transitional-style headboard from Skyline Furniture. Designed to work just as well in contemporary living spaces as traditionally decorated rooms, this headboard features crisp, clean white microsude upholstery that blends seamlessly with numerous color palettes for an easy fit in your space.Skyline Furniture transitional-style headboard features crisp, clean white upholstery for easy matchingDurable 100 percent polyester microsuede upholstery ensures lasting beautyIndividual pewter nail head accents along the curved edges add a fashionable finishing touchIncludes upholstered headboard with sturdy metal legs that attaches to any standard bed frameMade with a solid pine frame, metal legs, polyester fill and polyester fabric for durability and longevityTwin measures 41" W x 4" D x 58" H
Full measures 56" W x 4" D x 58" H
Queen measures 62" W x 4" D x 58" H
King measures 78" W x 4" D x 58" H
California king measures 74" W x 4" D x 58" HSpot clean onlyStyleTransitionalMaterialFabric, Metal, Microsuede, Pine, Polyurethane, WoodTypeUpholsteredFinishWhite FinishAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorWhiteFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesIncludes Hardware, Made To Order
